rule_text: Attained_Age > 78.5 AND Attained_Age > 84.5 AND Insurance_Plan > 1.5 AND Duration > 21.5 AND Face_Amount_Band <= 4.5 AND Smoker_Status > 0.5

interpretation.risk: Mortality is 12.87x the population average (1186.7% higher).
